Ian Eriksen 2 Yd Run (Paul Fricano Kick)

videos.headline: Charlotte forces turnover on opening drive
videos.description: Juwan Foggie strips the ball from Eastern Michigan receiver Antoine Porter for the first turnover of the game.

videos.headline: Bostick with the contested TD
videos.description: Trent Bostick catches the pass from Hassan Klugh by pressing the ball up against the defenders head for the score.

videos.headline: Eagles punch it in at goal line
videos.description: Ian Eriksen takes the hand off and runs it into the end zone for the two-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Charlotte picks off downfield pass
videos.description: Ed Rolle sits and waits downfield to intercept the pass from Brogan Roback

videos.headline: Charlotte's trick play ends with INT
videos.description: Justin Moody picks off the pass from Charlotte RB Chris Montgomery on a trick play gone wrong.

videos.headline: Eastern Michigan pushes pile into end zone
videos.description: Ian Eriksen ducks below his offensive line and pushes his way into the end zone for the touchdown.
